name: Cycotics
overview: Two teenagers get up one morning, after playing a whole weekend of Grand Theft Auto (could replace with similar game/genre). Easily influenced, they decide to go for a street race, but realise quickly they don't have a car. Not to let this deter them, and fueled with 48 hours non-stop GTA and not pleased with the fact that it is a Monday morning. They get on their bikes and go for a ride... Warning: Remember kids, never go on a bike ride when you're in a bad mood.
